      • processAsync

        public long processAsync(Sentence sentence)
        Description copied from interface: ISentenceProcessor
        This is asynchronous definition of the Process method. The invocation of this method returns a long 'requestId' as output parameter. This requestId is used to poll for the result of the asynchronous process..

      • tryGetResult

        public Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId,
                   List<PartOfSpeech> hltContents)
        Description copied from interface: ISentenceProcessor
        This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for a requestId. The boolean return type indicates whether the output is ready or not..
        Specified by:
        tryGetResult in interface ISentenceProcessor<PartOfSpeech>
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request id
        hltContents - the hlt contents
        Returns:
